greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of longest contiguous block of 0's in binary expansion of n-th prime.
mathematica: f[n_] := Length[ Union[ DeleteCases[ Split[ IntegerDigits[n, 2]], 1, 2]][[ -1]]]; Table[ f[ Prime[n]], {n, 1, 105}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 03 2003 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 20 2003
